Data Fields
EDMA_paramSetConfig_t_ Struct Reference

PaRAM Set configuration. More...

#include <drivers/edma/edma.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t sourceAddress
 Starting byte address of source.
 
uint32_t destinationAddress
 Starting byte address of destination.
 
uint16_t aCount
 Number of bytes in each Array (ACNT).
 
uint16_t bCount
 Number of Arrays in each Frame (BCNT).
 
uint16_t cCount
 Number of Frames in a block (CCNT).
 
uint16_t bCountReload
 Reload value of the numArrInFrame (BCNT) Relevant only for A-sync transfers.
 
int16_t sourceBindex
 Index between consec. arrays of a Source Frame (SRCBIDX).
 
int16_t destinationBindex
 Index between consec. arrays of a Destination Frame (DSTBIDX).
 
int16_t sourceCindex
 Index between consecutive frames of a Source Block (SRCCIDX).
 
int16_t destinationCindex
 Index between consecutive frames of a Dest Block (DSTCIDX).
 
uint16_t linkAddress
 Address for linking (AutoReloading of a PaRAM Set) This must point to a valid aligned 32-byte PaRAM set A value of 0xFFFF means (EDMA_NULL_LINK_ADDRESS) no linking.
 
uint8_t transferType
 transfer type which can be one of those defined in EDMA transfer type definitions.
 
uint8_t transferCompletionCode
 transfer Completion Code, must be in the range [0,63].
 
uint8_t sourceAddressingMode
 Source addressing mode, see EDMA addressing modes definitions..
 
uint8_t destinationAddressingMode
 Destination addressing mode, see EDMA addressing modes definitions..
 
uint8_t fifoWidth
 FIFO width, see EDMA FIFO width definitions..
 
bool isStaticSet
 STATIC bit of OPT as described in the EDMA UG.
 
bool isEarlyCompletion
 This is bit TCCMODE of OPT as defined in EDMA UG.
 
bool isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled
 This is bit TCINTEN of OPT as defined in EDMA UG.
 
bool isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled
 This is bit ITCINTEN of OPT as defined in EDMA UG.
 
bool isFinalChainingEnabled
 This is bit TCCHEN of OPT as defined in EDMA UG.
 
bool isIntermediateChainingEnabled
 This is bit ITCCHEN of OPT as defined in EDMA UG.
 

Detailed Description

PaRAM Set configuration.
